ModMetaData.name: fried rice
ModMetaData.author: boomer
ModMetaData.description: Core: - Adjusts melanin commonality - Allows Devilstrand and Corn in hydroponics basin - Allows deconstruction of ancient ruins - Boomalopes bleed chemfuel - Incident pawns stats are now visible - Increases Gold and Silver beauty: -4 -> 4 - Increases Plasteel durability: 2.8 -> 3 - Increases Steel durability: 1 -> 2 - Increases pregnancy duration from 18 days to 45 days - Metal is no longer flammable - Nerfs the cost of spike traps - Permanent enemies no longer flee - Prepatches tribal facions to allow for custom xenotypes - Removes breach raids - Removes breakdowns for electrical buildings - Removes drop pod raids - Removes mineable Components from map generation - Removes narrow pawn heads - Removes sapper and siege raids - Removes tribal faction requirement for headdress and war mask - Removes work disablers for slaves - Renames Healroot to Xerigium - Renames Megasloth to Megatherium
